text: is a district located in Okhotsk Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 24,608 and a population density of 17.25 persons per km². The total area is 1,426.74 km². In 1869, when Hokkaido was divided into 11 provinces and 86 districts, Shari was placed in Kitami Province. ==Towns and villages== *Kiyosato *Koshimizu *Shari Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Shari District, Hokkaido
